txt.en: 'It is time. You have prepared us well, and with your strength, we will voyage onward to spread word of Saruman's evil ways. This will be a hard trip, but we must do it for the safety of Dunland and the Avanc-lûth.\n\n'When you are ready, use my horse and he will lead the way to Gwin in Carreglyn.'
'What a horrible time this is for Dunland.  We fight amongst each other and Saruman plays us for fools.  What should we do?  The Avanc-lûth are outnumbered.  We must seek help to the North.'

Tecwin has told you that the time is now for the voyage downriver. The boats and supplies are ready. The people are ready. Now you need to find the rest of the Boar-clan and report what is happening in the Dunbog and western Dunland.
Ride Tecwin's Horse and then talk to Gwin

Gwin awaits you above Wulf's Cleft.

Having travelled from Dunbog, you have arrived to find Gwin looking down at a large Dunlending army.

Speak to Gwin to find out what happened here.
